title.value: The Invasion of Ukraine Viewed through TikTok: A Dataset
title.justification: This is the exact title of the paper as presented.
title.quote: The Invasion of Ukraine Viewed through TikTok: A Dataset

extractions.description: The paper presents a dataset comprising TikTok video descriptions, comments, and user statistics centered around the Russian invasion of Ukraine in 2022. The authors aim to investigate the language and social interaction dynamics on the TikTok platform regarding this geopolitical event.

type.justification: The paper collects and analyzes a dataset from TikTok to study social dynamics and interactions, making it empirical.
type.quote: We present a dataset of video descriptions, comments, and user statistics, from the social media platform TikTok, centred around the invasion of Ukraine in 2022, an event that launched TikTok into the geopolitical arena.

name.justification: The paper investigates social dynamics and language interactions on TikTok, placing it in the realm of Social Computing.
name.quote: Given this, we seek to investigate, and enable others to investigate, the relationship between TikTok and the social communications and interactions surrounding the invasion of Ukraine, as well as its underlying mechanics.

name.justification: The paper involves the analysis of language usage and word dynamics, which is a core aspect of Natural Language Processing.
name.quote: At the macro-level, we look at word use and the languages used on the platform; and at the meso-level, we expose semantic clusters reflecting real-world perspectives.

name.justification: The dataset collection from TikTok, as well as the subsequent data analysis falls under the domain of Data Mining.
name.quote: To pull this dataset, we developed a TikTok web scraper, PyTok, that allows us to download a variety of data from the platform.

name.value: TikTok dataset on the Invasion of Ukraine
name.justification: The paper contributes a dataset that includes TikTok video descriptions, comments, and user statistics related to the Ukraine invasion.
name.quote: We present a dataset of video descriptions, comments, and user statistics, from the social media platform TikTok, centred around the invasion of Ukraine in 2022, an event that launched TikTok into the geopolitical arena.
